class Car # always CamelCase
  def initialize(color = "white") # constructor
    puts "I create a new car"
    # The instance variables
    @color = color
    @engine_started = false
    @brand = "Toyota"
  end

  def start # instance method
    message = "Let's start the car"
    puts message
    connect_battery()
    ignite_motor()
    crank_engine()
    # ...
    @engine_started = true
  end

  def stop # another instance method
    @engine_started = false
  end

  def engine_started?
    return @engine_started
  end

  attr_reader :brand

  # attr_reader + attr_writer
  attr_accessor :color

  # getter / reader
  # def color
  #   return @color
  # end

  # setter / writer
  # def color=(new_color)
  #   @color = new_color
  # end

  private

  def connect_battery
    # specific stuff
    puts "connecting battery"
  end

  def ignite_motor
    # specific stuff
    puts "igniting motor"
  end

  def crank_engine
    # specific stuff
    puts "cranking engine"
  end
end
